body.name: Pure Enrichment® MistAire™ Silver Ultrasonic Cool Mist Humidifier for Bedroom, Office, Nursery & Indoor Plants - Lasts Up to 25 Hours, Whisper-Quiet Operation, Optional Night Light, & Auto Shut-Off
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 20 hrs 35 mins
features: ULTRASONIC COOL MIST HUMIDIFIER: Breathe easier with this powerful, easy-fill cool mist humidifier. Use it continuously for up to 25 hours on low, or up to 12 hours on high, for quick relief from dry air problems all year long.

COLD & CONGESTION RELIEF: High and low-speed settings, combined with an adjustable 360° mist nozzle that directs moisture right where you need it, help you consistently balance and regulate the humidity in your home during any dry months for relief from coughing, colds, congestion, sore throat, sinus issues, allergies, and dry skin.

AMPLE ROOM COVERAGE: Safely moisturize the air in spaces up to 250 sq. ft. This ultrasonic humidifier holds up to 1.5L of water; making it great for adding moisture to bedrooms, offices, nurseries, living rooms, or any medium-sized space that needs extra humidity.

PERFECT FOR OVERNIGHT USE: Designed to give you a restful night’s sleep, the whisper-quiet operation barely makes any sound, while the optional night light offers a soft blue glow that’s perfect for a baby’s nursery. For added safety, the automatic shut-off function instantly turns off the humidifier when the water level is low or the tank.

5-YEAR WARRANTY: This BPA-Free humidifier comes with an AC power adapter, disk cleaning brush, user manual, and Pure Enrichment’s guaranteed 5-Year Warranty. Our customer support team provides daily quality service and peace of mind to millions worldwide all from a brand you can trust.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice and quiet. Gives off a fine, cool mist, has several different settings and has a built in night light that you can choose to have on or off. Simple to use and easy to clean. Very lightweight and can easily fit on a nightstand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Bedside HUmidifier
reviews.reviewText: I was purposely looking for a very low output bedside humidifier with a directional delivery spout, to help with my sinuses at night and nosebleeds in morning. On the 'low' setting this one is perfect for that. On low it puts out a fine mist that I can aim towards my head, yet it doesn't wet my head or pillow- it just gives a little (but noticeable) humidity boost to my breathing zone.It is ultrasonic, so those (me) with high water hardness must use distilled water, or will be breathing in micro particles of minerals and chlorine. In my use case, the low output is very helpful, as I don't have to go through gallons of expensive distilled water to get the job done. In 3 nights, I think I've only gone through half a tank or less. That said, if you use the high setting, the output volume increases dramatically, maybe 2 or 3 times low. Still, I don't think it would humidify my entire large bedroom with forced hot air- there is too much airflow there.Operationally- The spout is a little hard to rotate (sticks a bit), but presumably you only have to do it once and you're done. Or use a pencil in the output hole- easy.Small footprint- it fits well next to my clock radio. You turn the device on, and cycle through 5 modes, by just touching the 'on' button in front. Very sleek, and easier to clean than an actual mechanical button. The 5 cycles are low, low with light, high with light, high (no light), then off.A small point- I find the nightlight more annoying than useful. It is a pale blue color that bothers me at night (unlike orange or red), and so I don't plan to use it, but some may like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great First Humidifier
reviews.reviewText: I received this humidifier as a Christmas gift and I love it. The instructions are simple to understand, and using the humidifier is a breeze. I use this humidifier almost every night, and it's mostly quiet as a whistle, except every now and then it makes a draining sound (I can best describe it as a bloop sound). I also love the nightlight being part of the humidifier. It's a very dim, soft blue light, but it still gives enough light to where you can see your surroundings. The water tank holds a great amount of distilled water. If I fill it halfway, it lasts an entire night and halfway through the next morning. If I fill it to the maximum (I recommend just filling it halfway), it lasts even longer. In conclusion, I highly recommend giving this humidifier a try!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for nursery
reviews.reviewText: This is a great, compact humidifier perfect for a nursery - quiet, effective, nice LED light. Although, I wish this product was a top fill unit, which would make it more user friendly. While the curved water tank looks good, it makes it harder to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The unit was smaller than I thought it would be so I wondered how effective it was going to be, and was nicely surprised. It has a low and a high setting for mist output, and both put out good quantities of cool mist that you can easily direct. It is QUIET too! I have it right by the bed and had no issues at all with noise. It has stable rubberized feet. You can also choose whether to have the night light on or off - and it is pleasant/not overbearing when on. I feel I got a great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small and Effective!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the MistAire Silver Ultrasonic Cool Mist Humidifier for my bedroom. This model is smaller than I expected; however, it works equally well as the last humidifier that held almost 1 gallon of water. I keep my humidifier running all night long and the MistAire tank still has water in the morning. It is very, very quiet and you can elect to either have the night light on or off. It has touch control versus turning a dial. My cat likes to sleep next to the humidifier; so, I need to be careful where I place it so that she does not accidentally touch the control setting when walking/rubbing next to it.One thing to note is that I also purchased the Protec Humidifier Tank Cleaning Fish; it is too large for the opening into the water tank. I was able to find the Protect Humidifier Tank Cleaning Cartridge (shape of small ball) that fits fine. Regardless of brand of humidifier, I recommend using these as it prevents the pink mold from building up. It also helps to use distilled water. Note that the Pure Enrichment® MistAire™ Silver Ultrasonic Cool Mist Humidifier includes a cleaning brush. Too early to comment on cleaning!Definitely Recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute design, easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this PureBaby humidifier for my daughter's bedroom. I have the same one in my bedroom, so I knew it worked well. I chose the whisper green color to compliment her room decor. My favorite thing about the humidifier is that it's simple to fill and lightweight, and one fill generally last two nights. There are two humidifier settings, and I like the fact that I can also choose to illuminate the nightlight or not. It's small with a clean, modern design and a beautiful color. Five stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I know a common problem for humidifiers is mildew/mold growth and unfortunately this one is no exception. It runs well, is very quiet, and overall gets the job done. Unfortunately the reservoir is almost impossible to clean because the only opening is to put water in despite mold collecting all along the base. We've run distilled water though it only, tried the mildew reducing tabs, etc. and nothing seems to work. It wouldn't be such a big deal if it weren't so difficult to clean.

Accidentally broke the water tank. Really fast replies and promised to send me a new unit. Can’t go wrong with their humidifier.Although the unit is smaller than I hoped, so make sure it is the right size for you

I like that it doesn't take up too much space on my night table. I also like that you have 2 speeds and option of light on or off. It's not noisey and water on high speed lasst all night. Well priced too!

This is a nice product, I would keep that as 5 stars. But I want to point out one thing is that I really wish that there is another mode, a medium level that's between low and high. Low was sufficient for me, but sometimes I need more humidity level. When I tried high mode, it was strong, it did help my baby nephew with her cold a lot, her nose was stuffy. However, it got my floor soaked. I think it was because I put it on low surface. If anyone wonders about cleaning brush, well I do wish that there are more different than just one cleaning brush like I think the current one is slightly short to reach inside the hole to clean the top plastic part.

I took a month before I posted this, just to make sure I didn't have the leakage issue that all other humidifiers seem to give me after a month. This is an absolutely amazing purchase. I love that you can disconnect the cord, that's a huge selling point. Putting the water in is a little strange but I am completely used to it by now. I have only had to clean it out once so far (but I put already-filtered water into the container). And the fact that you have the option of it being on with no light is amazing, I usually have to tape sticky notes over things I use at night. It does make a loud gurgling noise when water moves down to the base, but otherwise I honestly forget this thing is running all the time, it is SO quiet! Aesthetically pleasing, easy to use and clean, has a warrantee option available, super quiet, no or blue lighting. And most importantly, it works! My apartment is usually so dry and this helps me sleep through the night without my entire mouth and throat drying out.Not sure why it's asking me about warmth - it has no temperature. I put a couple things along with in the photo just for a sense of its size. I would definitely recommend this one.

Love this i bought 2 and they are great ! Works good .. easy enough to clean with a brush and vinegar with water 💧.. love the shape as well and the vapor is good ! Love that you can add oil in the little slot at the side if needed .. I personally love it because it doesn't make surface wet big does a great job ... I have a green one for my plants and they love it ..I see alot of new growth since I started using it ..I love the night light feature really nice model
